title: onesait Platform Notebook
description: Compares Linear, Ridge and Lasso regression algorithms
detailedDescription:
This Notebook allows to compare the Linear, Ridge and Lasso regression algorithms to predict house prizing on the Boston dataset.

The machine learning library used is scikit-learn.

This notebook uses exclusive features of Apache Zeppelin to represent some data.

Create a new Notebook and include the code included in the js below.
